items.title: Can't access Samsung account storage
items.text: Your Samsung account storage has been locked due to a personal data request.

items.title: Processing your request
items.text: To handle your personal data request, we've locked your Samsung account storage and turned off Sync and Auto back up.

items.title: Processing of personal data restricted
items.text: You've requested restriction of processing of your personal data for this service. To remove the restriction, go to the website where you made the request.
